targets.expr:
{job="ctf"}
  |~ "workflowID"
  | json
  | level="error"
  | line_format `level={{.level}} ts={{.ts}} logger={{.logger}} caller={{.caller}} msg="{{.msg}}" version={{.version}} workflowID={{.workflowID}} stepRef={{.stepRef}} workflowExecutionID={{.workflowExecutionID}} state={{.state}}`

{job="ctf"}
  |~ "workflowID"
  | json
  | level="info"
  | line_format `level={{.level}} ts={{.ts}} logger={{.logger}} caller={{.caller}} msg="{{.msg}}" version={{.version}} workflowID={{.workflowID}} stepRef={{.stepRef}} workflowExecutionID={{.workflowExecutionID}} state={{.state}}`

{job="ctf"}
  |~ "workflowID"
  | json
  | level="debug"
  | line_format `level={{.level}} ts={{.ts}} logger={{.logger}} caller={{.caller}} msg="{{.msg}}" version={{.version}} workflowID={{.workflowID}} stepRef={{.stepRef}} workflowExecutionID={{.workflowExecutionID}} state={{.state}}`
